Back To Recipes

recipe

Get out the following ingredients:

ground beef 1 pound
avacado oil 2 Tbsp
smoked paprika 4 dash
chilli powder 4 dash
garlic powder 4 dash
Show Ingrendients

Estimated Time: 18 Minutes

Recipe:

Form 2, 1 inch hamburgers with 1 pound ground beef
Add the following to the pan
> 2 Tbsp avacado oil
> hamburgers
Cook on heat 5 (Takes 6 minutes)
Season hamburger with the following
> 2 dashs smoked paprika
> 2 dashs chilli powder
> 2 dashs garlic powder
Flip hamburgers
Cook on heat 5 (Takes 6 minutes)
Season hamburger with the following
> 2 dashs smoked paprika
> 2 dashs chilli powder
> 2 dashs garlic powder
Flip hamburgers
Cook on heat 5 (Takes 6 minutes)
